articles.title: Company director fined for collecting $112k in kickbacks from migrant workers
articles.content: Twelve other charges were taken into consideration for his sentencing, said the Ministry of Manpower (MOM) in a press release. In 2020, Loo and the four individuals collected amounts ranging from $900...
